statements: DELETE FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE player_id = 1 AND from_team = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE player_name = 'John Doe' AND transfer_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM player_transfer_history WHERE player_id = 100 AND transfer_fee > 50000;
DELETE FROM trade_records WHERE trade_id = 200 AND trade_value < 10000;
DELETE FROM player_transfer_history WHERE player_id = 101 AND transfer_date <= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM trade_records WHERE trade_id IN (SELECT trade_id FROM trade_records WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31')
DELETE FROM TransferHistory WHERE player_id = 100 AND transfer_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TradeRecords WHERE trade_id = 500 AND trade_date > '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE player_id = 1 AND from_team_id = 2;
